Bah bring back the old transformers or at least redo the old episodes using
CGA. I'd love to see g1 transformers done by mainframe.

They have the scripts they have the shows, hell dub in the voices and bang
transformers g1 for the new generation.

but noooooo what did they do? Sailor moonize one series (RID) and smurfed
the other (BW/BM)

:)
